mod.name: Merc's Extended Clip
mod.author: TedDraws#0648 aka Mercenary
mod.description:
A rebalance of the food, and industrial production systems. version 1.7
NOW WITH NEW ITEMS!
FOOD PRODUCTION -Fruits now yields 3 units -Roots now yields 3 units -Nuts now yields 2 units -Artificial Meat now yields 2 units
INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION -Ice to Water now takes 0.1 ice (instead of 0.2) -Chemicals Carbon to Plastics now takes 0.5 carbon (instead of 1) -Rebalanced all weapons production costs
NEW WEAPONS -Laser rifle -Plasma thrower
